ComicInfo.Summary: Ivory gets in over her head as she explores the underbelly of New York City nightclub life: the secret world of the bloodsuckers. Hidden doors are suddenly opened, and clandestine societies are revealed. Ivory’s new “friends” are out to show her that blood really is thicker than water...
ComicInfo.Title: Book One: Blue Blood Chapter Two: Spellbound
ComicInfo.Writer: Eva Hopkins,Joseph Michael Linsner,Joseph Michael Linsner,Eva Hopkins
ComicInfo.Colorist: Eva Hopkins,Joseph Michael Linsner,Joseph Michael Linsner,Eva Hopkins
